item.title: SPIRE INC 10-K
item.description: SPIRE INC, which is in the Natural Gas Distribution [4924] industry, SEC 10-K filing on November 16, 2022 had 43319 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: spire - 1353 instances gas - 612 instances missouri - 519 instances 2022 - 487 instances company - 389 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
